model_details.description: LERC is a BERT model that is trained to mimic human judgement scores on candidate answers in the MOCHA dataset. LERC outputs scores that range from 1 to 5, however, to stay consistent with metrics such as BLEU and ROUGE, we normalize the output of LERC to be between 0 and 1 in this demo.
model_details.short_description: A BERT model that scores candidate answers from 0 to 1.

paper.title: MOCHA: A Dataset for Training and Evaluating Generative Reading Comprehension Metrics
